fields.name: The Orb of Polaris
fields.description: A warlock sends you on a quest to find the Orb of Polaris, in a cave in the frozen arctic. Bring your winter coat!
fields.intro_text:
As you left the Main Hall, you felt that strange wrenching in your stomach and it seemed to make your vision go blurry. As soon as your vision clears again you see you have been teleported to the chamber of a mighty warlock!

The warlock tells you he cast a spell to have the most highly qualified person in the land teleported to his chamber. That could only mean you!

"I need your assistance in obtaining an object that has been stolen from me," he says. "It is an item of great power and consequence. It is a magical orb that was found by my grandfather after being lost for seventy-five thousand years (give or take a few days).

"The orb must not fall into the wrong hands, or it could mean great disaster! I would go myself, but I am too old to fight any longer.

"I can sense the orb in a series of caverns far to the north of here, in the frozen Arctic. The caverns are shielded by mystical defenses that prevent me from teleporting inside. So, I need a brave adventurer to go in my stead.

"Find the Orb of Polaris and return it to me, and I will give you the greatest reward you could ever imagine!", he says.

Before you can ask any questions, he waves his hand and you find yourself teleported to a frozen hillside.

fields.name: You are outside an ice cave. (N/S)
fields.description: You stand on an arctic hillside, surrounded by waist-deep piles of snow. It is about twenty below out here and you are very cold. The entrance to the cave is to the south. To the north is a trail through the snow that leads home.

fields.name: You are in an icy north/south tunnel.
fields.description: It is slightly warmer inside the cave, but still very cold. The walls are covered in ice and there are snow drifts on the floor. A frosty wind blows in from the north entrance. To the south is a dimly lit tunnel, but the ice reflects enough light that you can see clearly.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the icy tunnel. (N/E)
fields.description: You are in an icy tunnel. The tunnel bends to the east here, so you may go east or north. Icicles are hanging from the ceiling.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (N/E/W)
fields.description: There is a cold wind blowing through the tunnel. A cold dark chamber is to the north.

fields.name: You are at an icy T-intersection. (S/E/W)
fields.description: The east/west tunnel intersects with a tunnel running south. Even this far underground, the air is still frigid. The tunnel to the south has more ice on the walls than the tunnel to the east.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an icy east/west tunnel. To the north there is a chamber.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the icy tunnel. (S/W)
fields.description: You are at a bend in the tunnel. The tunnel bends to the south here. It is still very cold in here.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are in a cold north/south tunnel. To the east is a chamber.

fields.name: You are in a cold stone room. (W)
fields.description: There is a great deal of ice covering the walls and floor in here. The exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are at an intersection in a cold tunnel. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are at an intersection in the cold icy tunnel. The tunnels go east, north and south.

fields.name: You are in an east/west tunnel. (S/E/W)
fields.description: It is still very cold in here. There is a room to the south.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the tunnel. (S/W)
fields.description: The tunnel bends to the south here. You may go west or south. Frost covers the walls of the tunnel.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are in a cold north/south tunnel. To the east is a large rough chamber.

fields.name: You are in a rough frosty chamber. (W)
fields.description: You are in a rough chamber with thick layers of frost on the walls, ceiling and floors. The door is to the west.

fields.name: You are at an intersection the tunnel. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are at an intersection in the cold tunnel. You may go west, east or north. The east and west tunnels lead into chambers.

fields.name: You are in a cold ice coated room. (W)
fields.description: You are in a cold east chamber. Ice on the walls is very thick. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in a cold west chamber. (E)
fields.description: You are in a cold chamber with ice and frost on the walls and floor. The exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a small icy room. (N)
fields.description:
You are in a small icy room to the south of the icy tunnel. Icicles hang from the ceiling and frost covers the floor.

Carved into the wall, you see the words, "Polaris hates fire."

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are in a cold north/south tunnel. A room lies to the west. There are layers of frost on the floor making it fairly slippery in here.

fields.name: You are in a small cold chamber. (E)
fields.description: There are a bunch of icicles hanging from the roof of the room. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a cold north/south tunnel. (N/S/E)
fields.description: To the east there is a small cold chamber.

fields.name: You are in a small cold chamber. (W)
fields.description: There is a lot of ice chunks and chips all over the floor in here. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection. (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are at a cold bleak intersection. To the east, west, and north are ice coated tunnels.

fields.name: You are in an icy east/west tunnel.
fields.description: You are at the east end of an ice tunnel. To the east is a large ice cavern.

fields.name: You are in a large ice cavern. (W)
fields.description: There are massive icicles hanging from the ceiling and thick layers of ice cover the walls and floor. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are at an icy T-intersection. (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at an icy intersection. To the east, west and south are ice covered tunnels.

fields.name: You are in a north/south tunnel. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are in a cold north/south tunnel. To the east is a small ice cave.

fields.name: You are in a small ice cavern. (W)
fields.description: Icicles hang from the ceiling and ice covers the floor. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in a thawing north/south tunnel.
fields.description: The ice in the tunnel here is melting. It seems to be much warmer in this part of the tunnel. You feel a warm breeze from the south.

fields.name: You are at a wet intersection. (N/E/W)
fields.description: It seems to be much warmer here. The ice has all melted here and the tunnel is very wet. You may go east, west or north.

fields.name: You are in a small living chamber. (W)
fields.description: You are in a small chamber used as a living chamber. The room is well lit and well decorated. To the west is the door.

fields.name: You are in a warm laboratory. (E)
fields.description: You are in a laboratory of some kind. It is warm in here compared to the rest of the tunnels you have been in. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are at the west end of an icy tunnel. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at the west end of an icy east/west tunnel. There are chambers north, south, and west. All of the rooms look very cold.

fields.name: You are in an icy south chamber. (N)
fields.description: You are in an icy chamber to the south of an east/west tunnel. There are lots of icicles hanging from the ceiling and patches of ice all over the floor. The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are in an icy north chamber. (S)
fields.description: There are patches of ice all over the floor and icicles hanging from the ceiling. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are in a cold west chamber. (E)
fields.description: To the east is the only exit. The chamber is mostly dry, but is very cold.

fields.name: You are in an icy north/south tunnel. (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are in a north/south tunnel. Thick ice covers the walls. To the east is a doorway into an icy chamber.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the icy tunnel. (N/W)
fields.description: The tunnel bends to the west here so you may go north or west.

fields.name: You are in a cold east/west tunnel. (S/E/W)
fields.description: To the south there is a tiny chamber. The doorway is lined with icicles.

fields.name: You are in an icy east/west tunnel. (E/W)
fields.description: The ice is extremely thick in here. There are cracks and crevices on the north wall.

fields.name: You are in a small crevice in the ice. (S)
fields.description: You are in a crevice of the ice. The one exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the icy tunnel. (S/E)
fields.description: You are in a cold, icy tunnel. The tunnel bends to the south here. You may go east or south.

fields.name: You are outside the throne room. (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at the south end of an icy tunnel. To the east and west are small chambers. A bunch of icicles are hanging from the tops of the doorways. To the south is a larger, more opulent chamber. The cold is intense here, and the ice on the walls is a foot thick.

fields.name: You are in a small icy room. (W)
fields.description: There is a large ice carving on the wall in here. The only exit is to the west.

fields.name: You are in a small ice chamber. (E)
fields.description: This appears to be the guards' barracks. Two large beds sit along the walls, with layers of frost on the blankets. Icicles hang from the ceiling, but are too high to reach. The only exit is to the east.

fields.name: You are in a large frost covered room. (N)
fields.description: You are in a large room. The decoration in here is very elaborate; the thick ice has been carved into beautiful ice chandeliers, ice statues and carvings. The air is still and frigid. The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are in a secret tunnel. (N/E)
fields.description: To the east the tunnel opens into a large room. The tunnel ends to the west, but there is a secret passage leading north.

fields.name: You are in a large, icy cavern. (W)
fields.description: You are in a large room. The walls are covered with frost. Ice patches cover the floor and make it slippery in here.

fields.name: You are in an icy north room. (S)
fields.description: You are in an ice coated room to the north of the tunnel. Frosty walls and ice patches on the floor remind you how cold it is in here. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are in an icy north chamber. (S)
fields.description: Icicles hang from the ceiling. The only exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are in a small cold room. (W)
fields.description: It is dry in here except for a few patches of ice on the floor. The exit is west.

fields.name: You are in a tiny ice cave. (N)
fields.description: This cave would make a great den for an animal if they could stand the cold. The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: Freezier
fields.description: You see a magnificent sword that looks like it is made of ice (it isn't). It has a name engraved on the handle that reads, "Freezier".

fields.name: harpoon
fields.description: You see a long harpoon with vicious barbs.

fields.name: frozen adventurer
fields.description: You see a large block of ice in the form of a man. It is a frozen adventurer!

fields.name: fur coat
fields.description: You see a huge fur coat. It looks like it could keep you pretty warm in spite of the conditions in these tunnels.

fields.name: frozen Bleazak
fields.description: You see an old man all wrapped up in fur and blankets. He has frost on his face and appears to be frozen stiff. You recognize him as Bleazak, an old man from the Main Hall.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: You see an old mace.

fields.name: ice club
fields.description: You see a large club, encrusted with ice crystals.

fields.name: saber
fields.description: You see the saber that the adventurer was carrying.

fields.name: furs
fields.description: You see a pile of furs. They look like they could keep you pretty warm in spite of the conditions in these tunnels.

fields.name: Bowie knife
fields.description: You see a very large knife. Trapper Jack was carrying it.

fields.name: broadsword
fields.description: You see a large broadsword.

fields.name: flamethrower
fields.description: You see a strange looking device that shoots a deadly flaming goo.

fields.name: paper
fields.description: You see a piece of paper with some writing on it.

fields.name: puddle of water
fields.description: You see a large puddle of water. It is all that's left of poor Frosty!

fields.name: hat
fields.description: You see a funny looking black hat. It was worn by Frosty.

fields.name: coal eyes
fields.description: You see the coal eyes of Frosty.

fields.name: scarf
fields.description: You see the bright red scarf that Frosty was wearing.

fields.name: button
fields.description: You see Frosty's button nose.

fields.name: Orb of Polaris
fields.description: You see the gleaming Orb of Polaris. It seems to shimmer with light and power.

fields.name: shattered orb
fields.description: You see the shattered remains of the Orb of Polaris. Its light has gone out and it appears to be no more than fragments of crystal.

fields.name: sponge
fields.description: You see a large sponge.

fields.name: gold nuggets
fields.description: You see a small pile of gold nuggets. The old man must have been prospecting.

fields.name: ice chips
fields.description: You see some ice chips. Closer examination reveals them to be diamonds!

fields.name: ivory tusks
fields.description: You see the ivory tusks of a creature that has died. They are lying in the corner.

fields.name: treasure
fields.description: You see a small pile of treasure that the ice golem must have stolen from a party of adventurers or pirates.

fields.name: emerald
fields.description: You see a large emerald the ice troll was playing with when you came in. He has set it down to face you.

fields.name: ruby
fields.description: You see a beautiful red ruby sitting on an icy table.

fields.name: golden harp
fields.description: You see a beautiful golden harp sitting next to the throne.

fields.name: crystal sphere
fields.description: You see a beautiful sphere of crystal! Could this be the Orb of Polaris? But it doesn't seem magical.

fields.name: crystal statue
fields.description: You see a magnificent crystal statue! It is so beautiful you just know it must be very valuable.

fields.name: Polaris' body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Polaris. As he dies, he says "Now you shall never get the orb, you fool!"

fields.name: puddle of Frosty
fields.description: You see a pile of snow and coal, and the hacked-up scarf, hat and button nose of Frosty.

fields.name: dead ice golem
fields.description: You see the dead body of an ice golem.

fields.name: dead polar bear
fields.description: You see the dead body of a polar bear.

fields.name: Nanook's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Nanook. His fur coat and leggings have been hacked to useless blood-stained ribbons.

fields.name: Harry's body
fields.description: You see the hairy dead body of Harry.

fields.name: dead penguin
fields.description: You see the dead body of a penguin.

fields.name: dead frost monster
fields.description: You see the dead body of a frost monster lying in a heap on the floor.

fields.name: dead sorcerer
fields.description: You see the dead body of the sorcerer.

fields.name: dead ice troll
fields.description: You see the dead body of an ice troll.

fields.name: dead adventurer
fields.description: You see the dead body of the adventurer.

fields.name: Trapper Jack's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Trapper Jack.

fields.name: Glodsnortch's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of the Glodsnortch.

fields.name: Harbak's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Harbak.

fields.name: Chilly's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Chilly.

fields.name: Willy's body
fields.description: You see Willy fall to the floor and die.

fields.name: dead ice giant
fields.description: You see the dead body of the huge ice giant.

fields.name: dead ice troll
fields.description: You see the dead body of an ice troll.

fields.name: Bleazak's body
fields.description: You see the dead body of Bleazak.

fields.name: dead mammoth
fields.description: You see the dead body of the mammoth.

fields.name: dead Abominable Snowman
fields.description: You see the mangled body of the Abominable Snowman.

fields.name: a secret passage south
fields.description: You find a secret passage concealed behind the carving!

fields.name: a secret passage north
fields.description: You found a crevice in the north wall that is large enough to squeeze into.

fields.text: The paper is an instruction sheet for a flamethrower! You now know how to use one if you find one.

Polaris screams in pain as the flames touch him. He surrenders! He hands you the orb, then says, "You win, but you must remember: POWER is the key..." He sits back on his throne and waits for you to leave.
The warlock booms in a powerful voice, "You have done well. I shall reward you with the greatest of all rewards: To die in battle!"
The warlock chants a magic word and a bolt of energy flies from his fingers! You duck as it blasts a chunk of ice from the cave wall.
You find a magical barrier at the cave entrance. You hear the voice of the warlock that sent you here say, "Do not fail me! Find the orb!"
The warlock sees the shattered orb and cries, "You have double-crossed me! You will pay dearly for that some day!" He teleports away, leaving you alone at the entrance.
You see the puddle of water suddenly leap off the floor! The black hat, coal eyes, red scarf, and button nose that were once a snowman come back to life as Frosty reforms before your very eyes!
Polaris stands and says, "You will never have the orb!" He raises his shining blue sword.
The warlock takes the orb and cries, with an insane look on his face, "Not good enough! No one must know I have it! You die!"

fields.name: Polaris
fields.description: You see a man covered with frost. You thought it was a frozen man at first, but he is moving. He is also very large, at about 7 feet. He glares at you and says his name is Polaris, God of the North.

fields.name: Frosty
fields.description: You see a snowman with a corncob pipe and a button nose and two eyes made of coal. He is wearing a scarf and a funny black hat.

fields.name: Ice Golem
fields.description: You see a large humanoid type figure that looks like he is made entirely of ice. It is an ice golem!

fields.name: Polar Bear
fields.description: You see a large white bear. He does not appear to be adversely affected by the cold. He also does not appear to be very friendly.

fields.name: Nanook
fields.description: You see an Inuit man decked out in fur as thick as your arm. It is so thick he could use it for armour. He is carrying a long harpoon with a razor-sharp tip.

fields.name: Harry
fields.description: You see a man with the thickest body hair you have ever seen! It is so thick he is wearing only a loincloth and is still not cold! His beard almost covers his face. He says his name is Harry.

fields.name: Penguin
fields.description: You see a short chubby man in a tuxedo with a very large nose. Oops! It's just a penguin! He is very cute.

fields.name: Frost Monster
fields.description: You see a horrible looking creature that looks like it is made of frost. It is! It is! It's a vicious frost monster!

fields.name: Sorcerer
fields.description: You see a man in flowing black and gold robes. He looks like a sorcerer!

fields.name: Ice Troll
fields.description: You see a well-built, nasty looking troll with white hair and mustache. He is an ice troll! A very rare breed! He wields a massive, icy club.

fields.name: Adventurer
fields.description: You see a young man of about twenty. He says he cannot remember his name, but he knows he is an adventurer.

fields.name: Trapper Jack
fields.description: You see a burly man dressed in furs, carrying a very large knife. He says his name is "Trapper Jack".

fields.name: Glodsnortch
fields.description: You see a strange looking animal with black and gold stripes down its back. It is making a strange noise: "Glodsnortch!"

fields.name: Harbak
fields.description: You see a man with a large broadsword practicing his sword expertise on a test dummy. As you enter he greets you and says his name is "Harbak".

fields.name: Chilly
fields.description: You see a small man with a frosty beard. He is an ice gnome. He says his name is "Chilly".

fields.name: Willy
fields.description: You see a small man with a frosty beard. He is an ice gnome. He says his name is "Willy".

fields.name: Ice Giant
fields.description: You see an a tall, hulking ice giant! He looks balefully at you with a frigid look in his blue eyes.

fields.name: Ice Troll
fields.description: You see two trolls with white hair and white beards. They are ice trolls! They stand guard outside the throne room.

fields.name: Bleazak
fields.description: You see the old man come to life as he thaws out!

fields.name: Woolly Mammoth
fields.description: You see a huge, elephant-like creature covered in shaggy hair.

fields.name: Abominable Snowman
fields.description: You see a large white wooly creature that stands over 8 feet tall. This must be the legendary Abominable Snowman!

fields.name: Warlock
fields.description: The warlock who sent you on the quest stands at the cave entrance. He seems much younger, taller, and more powerful than when you first met him. The eerie purple glow of a protection spell surrounds him. He laughs and raises a hand. Magical sparks dance across his fingertips.

fields.question: How do I avoid freezing to death?
How do I get home alive?
How do I use the flamethrower?
Can I bring Frosty back when he melts?

fields.answer: You can cast POWER or SAY *INFO to get the magic word you need to shatter the Orb of Polaris.
You need to find some warm clothing. There are a couple of furs in the cave that will work.
The warlock will not let you leave without the orb. And if you have the orb, he'll try to take it from you. But maybe if you destroy it...
He is too tough to defeat. But he hates fire, and you could use that to your advantage.
Look for secret doors, especially ones where there are crevices in the wall.
You must READ PAPER (found in the warm laboratory), then READY it and ATTACK with it.
Yes, get the sponge, then get all of his parts (puddle, hat, coal, scarf, and button). Take his parts back to an icy tunnel and use the POWER spell.
From the first room go: S, S, E, E, S, E, and WEAR FUR.
You must find Polaris and get the Orb of Polaris from him. Then SAY the magic word to shatter it. (You cast the POWER spell to get the magic word; if you don't know POWER then SAY *INFO.)
READY the flamethrower and ATTACK him with it.
Find the polar bear's lair, and go N, then W, then LOOK WALL.
